inclusion.criterion: chronic SCI causing NDO and urinary incontinence
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients did not present with urinary incontinence
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients are known to be allergic to onabotulinumtoxinA
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. Started on ditropan changed over to detrol.
